history.content:
Dear Students,

We hope the last week of instruction went well for you.  And sending best wishes for R/R week and finals.

Please remember you can email us at any time for help and services:  cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu

There may be fewer appointment times available up until Winter Break and we have some staff out so we note the wait times for appointments have been getting longer....  We can do degree checks, review and sign forms such as double major forms and study abroad forms over emails, address issues/questions about APR.  Lots of things.  And we aim for prompt responses. 

Best Wishes from the Advising staff
history.subject: From Advising:  Reminder you can email us for help and services: cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu
